posts.title: Welcome to My Blog
posts.content: This is a sample blog post to get started.
posts.story:
User Expectations: People demand intuitive, responsive interfaces that work flawlessly across devices.
Collaboration Hub: It aligns designers, developers, and stakeholders, keeping everyone on the same page.
Speed to Market: A structured approach cuts down on rework, getting products out faster.
Scalability: Well-implemented designs lay the groundwork for future updates and features.
